description:
Mike is really doing well with experimenting on film. I asked if he would be up for doing a guy, and he mentioned he had played around as a kid, but nothing more than a guy giving him a blow job. So it wouldn't be too awkward, though he does smiles a lot through this video as if he can't believe he is doing it.
Westin, well, he really likes to fuck. So I told Mike we would try the oral thang, and if he felt comfortable (in other words, his dick stayed hard) he should try topping Westin. No problem there!
What I didn't count on was Mike's running monologue of domination talk. He is usually so quiet that the mics can barely pick his voice up. Westin got in to the verbal play (and I was beginning to respond as well!). Despite his eagerness to bottom, I think he was a little sore after the session.
Mike tells me he can suck his own dick...so let me know if that turns any of you on..I can get him for that!
title: Mike North & Westin - Wrapped
